text: [Music]
hello my name is raju dentaluri in this
video we will walk through how to
subscribe to an ami annual private offer
created without the flexible payment
schedule or fps
what is an ami annual private offer
ami-based software products can offer an
annual subscription pricing model in
which the buyer makes a one-time upfront
purchase for the desired number of
instances and types then pays no hourly
usage fees for the instance types and
quantities selected in the annual
contract terms
customers can apply one annual
subscription to an aws marketplace
software product to one amazon ec2
instance
customers can also continue to launch
and run the product using instance types
not included in the annual purchase
the customer will be built for the
additional usage at the ami products
hourly rate
charges for using amazon ec2 and other
services from aws are separate and in
addition to what you pay to purchase aws
marketplace software products
let's dive into the subscription process
for non-fps ami annual private offers as
a reminder these are private offers
where the buyer makes an upfront
purchase and does not use fps
here are the steps
first the customer will sign into the
aws account they want to use to
subscribe to the private offer
then they'll navigate to the private
offer and choose accept terms
it should be noted that if a customer
stops at this point they will be
subscribed to the private offer at the
hourly rate
meaning any usage of the product will
result in the customer being billed at
the hourly rate
next they'll enter the number of
instances they want to purchase annually
in the how many licenses section
and they'll select the applicable
instance type
if the customer is purchasing more than
one instance type
they'll need to enter the applicable
quantity for the additional instance
type in the how many license section and
select the applicable instance type
from there the customer will review
pricing and select create contract
and finally choose confirm
it is important to note that the payer
account will go through the process i
just described
if there are any other linked accounts
that need to use the private offer and
licenses then the linked accounts go in
and choose accept terms
this gives the linked accounts access to
the instances and the instances types
the payer account purchased
once the buyer has subscribed they will
be built up front for the annual amount
they subscribed to
any additional usage of the product is
billed at the hourly rate dictated in
the private offer and invoiced on the
third of the following month
thank you if you have any further
questions please reach out to mpcustest
at amazon.com
you
